description: Detects suspicious PowerShell scripts accessing SAM hives
author: Florian Roth
false_positives: PowerShell scripts fixing HiveNightmare / SeriousSAM ACLs
name: PowerShell SAM Copy
query: (process.command_line.text:*\\HarddiskVolumeShadowCopy* AND process.command_line.text:*System32\\config\\sam* AND process.command_line.text:(*Copy\-Item* OR *cp\ $_.* OR *cpi\ $_.* OR *copy\ $_.* OR *.File\]\:\:Copy\(*))
